Submodules

parser_pro.core.methods.decorator module

parser_pro.core.methods.decorator.method(func)

This is a decorator used to implement methods used in parser

Hint:

checks compatibility of input data with method args each implemented method will take 2 args namely ( data , args ). Type of each arg is optional but type hint should be given
